Pick Event. Purchase. Print or Show QR Code at the gate!

2024 race schedule

2024 RACE SCHEDULE (SCHEDULE IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE)

Saturday, February 24, 2024 (day event) - TEST & TUNE

Saturday, March 16, 2024 (night race) - SEASON OPENER (SHIFTER SHOWDOWN)

Saturday, April 6, 2024 (night race) -(HIGH SCHOOL CHALLENGE)

Saturday, May 4, 2024 (night race) -4 x 4 TRUCK OFF

Saturday, June 1, 2024 (night race) - JR DRAGSTER SHOOTOUT

Saturday, July 6, 2024 (night race) - TOP GUN BATTLE ON THE BEACH

Sunday, July 7, 2024 (night race)

Saturday, August 10, 2024 (night race) - NAPA LADIES NIGHT

Saturday, August 31, 2024 (night race) - SUPER PRO SHOOTOUT

Sunday, September 1, 2024 (night race) - SUPER PRO SHOOTOUT and WALLY RACE

Saturday, October 5, 2024 (day race) - GROCERY GETTER

Saturday, November 16, 2024 (day race) - TWO-WHEEL TAKEDOWN and KING OF THE TRACK

the western most nhra track!

The Kauai Raceway Park is the Western most NHRA track in the USA. We are a member of the "Magnificent Seven" and was awarded the "Most Improved" track in 2014.

GIRA (Garden Isle Racing Association) is a not-for-profit corporation which promotes safe motorsports and responsible street driving. All drag racing events take place at the Kauai Raceway Park, a National Hot Rod Association (NHRA) sanctioned track. GIRA hosts hundreds of spectators and competitors, with racers as young as 8 years old each year!

Come Race with us!
